author: yperbasis
content: <@&652918665943056397> Do `trace_` methods  have the same convention as `eth_`ones where the block number means the state at the **end** of the block? We have an old issue in Erigon reported by Nikita Mescheryakov when Erigon & Nethermind produce different `trace_callMany` outputs due to discrepancy in block number (https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/7675)
